description: [``botocore``] This release supports for a new API ListStackSetAutoDeploymentTargets, which provider auto-deployment configuration as a describable resource. Customers can now view the specific combinations of regions and OUs that are being auto-deployed.
[``botocore``] Adds the ability to use the default policy name by omitting the policyName parameter in calls to PutKeyPolicy and GetKeyPolicy
[``botocore``] This release adds support to allow customers to show different content within a channel depending on metadata associated with the viewer.
[``botocore``] This release launches the ModifyIntegration API and support for data filtering for zero-ETL Integrations.
[``botocore``] Fix two issues with response root node names.
